abstract: Analytical reviews on the level of evidence presented in publications. This report specifically covers the following publications: pmid32831142, pmid32812049, pmid32750000, pmid32445924, pmid32833297, pmid32285129, pmid32605363, pmid32827207, pmid32564072, pmid32813283, pmid32833548, pmid32791038, pmid32829737
name: Covid-19 LST Report 2020.08.27
